Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class ActionController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ActionController
public class ActionController
extends java.lang.Object
This class handles any action that can be requested by a player. It assumes that Controller has already checked that the request has been received by the active player, thus the only responsibility this class has is to make the requested action and return whether the operation was successful or not.

  • Method Details

    • buyAndPlaceDevCard

      public void buyAndPlaceDevCard​(PlayerBoard _player, int _rowIndex, int _colIndex, int _placementIndex) throws NotEnoughResourcesException, InvalidCardDevelopmentPlacementException, InvalidSlotIndexException, FullSlotException, java.util.EmptyStackException
      Method to be called when a ClientRequest : RequestBuyCardDevelopment is received
      Parameters:
      _player - the active player that wishes to buy a development card
      _rowIndex - the row index inside the market matrix of the desired card
      _colIndex - the column index inside the market matrix of the desired card
      _placementIndex - the index of the slot in which the player wants to place the bought card
      Throws:
      NotEnoughResourcesException - - player does not have enough resource to buy the card
      InvalidCardDevelopmentPlacementException - - card can't be placed because of placement rules
      InvalidSlotIndexException - - _placementIndex is such that : _placementIndex < 0 || _placementIndex > 2
      FullSlotException - - the slot at _placementIndex is full
      java.util.EmptyStackException

    • useMarket

      public java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> useMarket​(PlayerBoard _player, int _index, java.lang.String _selection) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Central method to grab Resources from the Marble market
      Parameters:
      _player - the player that wishes to grab resources
      _index - the index of the row or column selected by the player
      _selection - "row" or "column"
      Returns:
      Null if the player doesn't need to discard any resources, instance of Hashmap if the player has to discard some resources.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - when an invalid index is given for the corresponding _selection

    • activateProductionPowers

      public void activateProductionPowers​(PlayerBoard _player, ProductionSelection _productionSelection) throws InvalidSlotIndexException, NotEnoughResourcesException, CardLeaderRequirementsNotMetException
      Method used to activate a selection of production powers.
      Parameters:
      _player - The PlayerBoard requesting for his powers to be activated.
      _productionSelection - Instance of ProductionSelection containing the powers selected by the player.
      Throws:
      InvalidSlotIndexException - : thrown if an invalid index was selected for the CardDevelopmentSlot(s).
      NotEnoughResourcesException - : thrown if the player does not hold enough resources to activate all selected powers.
      CardLeaderRequirementsNotMetException

    • activateLeaderCard

      public boolean activateLeaderCard​(PlayerBoard _board, CardLeader _leaderToBeActivated)
      Method used to try and activate a CardLeader.
      Parameters:
      _leaderToBeActivated - CardLeader to be activated.
      Returns:
      true if the CardLeader was successfully activated, false if the card could not be activated.

    • discardResources

      public java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> discardResources​(PlayerBoard _player, java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> _discardSelection)
      This method discards the resources selected by a player, after he has used the market and it was found that he cannot place all of the collected resources in his deposit
      Parameters:
      _player - Player who is discarding the resources
      _discardSelection - A HashMap that represents the resources to be discarded
      Returns:
      null if the selection has generated a consistent state for the deposit, a map with the obtained resources from which the selection must be made, if otherwise.

    • discardCardLeader

      public void discardCardLeader​(PlayerBoard playerBoard, java.lang.Integer cardLeaderIndex)
      Method to discard a leader card, advancing the player's faith trail position by one and throwing away the selected card.
      Parameters:
      playerBoard - The playerboard of the player that wishes to discard his leader card.
      cardLeaderIndex - The index of the leader card within the leader card array list.

    • makeLorenzoMove

      public ActionCardEnum makeLorenzoMove()
      Method invoked after a player has ended his turn in a single player match, forcing Lorenzo to make a move.

    • checkBuyAndPlaceParams

      private void checkBuyAndPlaceParams​(PlayerBoard _player, int _rowIndex, int _colIndex, int _placementIndex) throws InvalidSlotIndexException, FullSlotException, InvalidCardDevelopmentPlacementException
      This private method is to be called to sanitize the input given to buyAndPlaceDevCard function. The method assures that the second statement of the method will not throw an exception, as if this were to occur the bought card would be picked up by GC and lost.
      Parameters:
      _player - _player param in buyAndPlaceDevCard
      _rowIndex - _rowIndex param in buyAndPlaceDevCard
      _colIndex - _colIndex param in buyAndPlaceDevCard
      _placementIndex - _placementIndex param in buyAndPlaceDevCard
      Throws:
      InvalidSlotIndexException - - thrown if an invalid slot index is passed
      FullSlotException - - thrown if selected slot already holds 3 cards
      InvalidCardDevelopmentPlacementException - - thrown if a placement in the selected slot would break the game rules
